resources.string: Welcome to Asterogram. An Instagram but for Asteroids. I will walk you through the app in a bit. Are you ready? Liftoff. 🚀
How should we call you, astronaut? 👨‍🚀
If you want, you can set up an username. It will look cooler when you check out your profile later. Or leave it blank and decide later in the profile settings, I will think of some cool name for you.
Scroll. Like. You know the drill… 📱
Scroll through (in)finite feed of asteroids that are downloaded from NASA (thx btw). You like that rock? 🪨 Like it to show\'em some love.
We don\'t have cats here in space 😿. But your fav rocks 🤘 can be saved and then accessed through your profile even on the deepest space journeys without internet connection.
